resources.string: Win up to ₹1000 just be on the app & answer a few question and claim your reward
Choose the highest run scoring batsman in this match
Choose highest wicket taking bowler in this match

1.To qualify: Choose team -> Choose batsman -> Choose bowler -> Wait to answer the Booster question in the middle of the OkPL game.
2. Match Score = [30 (for answering first 3 questions) + Batsman runs + (Bowler’s wickets x 20 runs) + 50 runs (if your team wins)] x Booster Multiplier (for answering Booster question)

Every match lucky 1000 will win up to Rs. 100.
Hint: Answering questions in the middle of the OkPL game will multiply your total score with a booster multiplier. Don’t forget to do that.

1.To qualify: Choose team -> Choose batsman -> Choose bowler -> Wait to answer the Booster question in the middle of the OkPL game.
2. Today's Score = [30 (for answering first 3 questions) + Batsman runs + (Bowler’s wickets x 20 runs) + 50 runs (if your team wins)] x Booster Multiplier (for answering Booster question)

Every match lucky 1000 will win up to Rs. 100.
Hint: Answering questions in the middle of the OkPL game will multiply your total score with a booster multiplier. Don’t forget to do that.
Complete first Booster task for the week in Today\’s Game screen
Complete second Booster for the week in Today\’s Game screen
YAYY!\nYou completed the first Booster Task
YAYY!\nYou completed the second Booster Task
HURRAY!!\nYou’ve scored %s runs in last 7 days
Tip: Keep collecting mystery runs at the end of the game to improve your score!
Congratulations!\nYou are qualified for Weekly Lucky Draw.
Yayy!! Scratch & collect lucky draw prizes!!!

1. Answer at least %d booster questions coming during the OkPL matches in the week -> Score %d runs in the week
2. Week starts from Sunday 3 PM to Saturday 11:59 PM
3. Weekly draw is announced every Sunday at 12PM
4. Scores on weekly draw are updated an hour after the match

Every Sunday, 500 players will get up to ₹1000.
Hint: Improve your chances by answering more booster questions

plurals.item: You’re just %d run away from completing this task
You’re just %s runs away from completing this task

resources.string:
• Top 10 players will win 2.5 gm Gold Coins worth ₹15,000
• Next 25 players will win assured prizes worth up to ₹10,000
• Subsequent 500 players will win OkCredit Jersey
• Next 500 players will win Mini Bats signed by the Delhi Capitals Team
• Leaderboard is updated an hour after the match

Hint: Play daily and answer booster question during the OkPL match to appear at the top in the leaderboard
Increase your chances by %d%% to win Gold coin, by coming during the OkPL match time
In race to win Mini Bat
Couldn\'t load active matches please try again
Please connect to internet to get live score updates
Mini bat signed by the Delhi Capitals Team
Scratch back and forth to see the reward
Couldn\'t claim reward. Please try again
Your booster task will be available in
Woohoo!!\nYour today’s game score will be multiplied by %d

Welcome! To OKPL weekly prizes screen. Visit us back on 20th September, 3 PM onwards to see your progress on the weekly draw. The first OKPL weekly draw will happen on Sunday, 26th Sep, 12:00 PM noon.

Win Prizes worth Rs. 50 Lakh during the OKPL tournament

Rules for weekly Draw
1. Answer at least 2 questions during the OkPL match in a week (Week starts from Sunday 3PM to Saturday 11:59 PM)
2. Score 1000 runs for this week and qualify

Starts on
Monday, 21st September, 12:00 AM(mid-night)

Win prizes worth ₹ 51 Lakhs during the tournament

Top 10 scorers will get Gold Coins of 2.5 grams

Next 1025 players will get assured rewards
Congratulations!\nYou have qualified for today’s lucky draw
Available at the end of match

string.u: Will deliver to current business location.

resources.string: I have won a %1$s please ship it to below address %2$s
You have not qualified for today’s match. Play again tomorrow.

This is how we calculate the score.\nToday’s Score = [30 (for answering first 3 questions) + Batsman’s runs + (Bowler’s Wicket x %1$s) runs + %2$s runs (If your team wins)] x Booster Multiplier (for answering Booster question)
Please add your payment details to claim the reward
Please add your payment details to claim the reward
